column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////One of my favorite pizza places in the city.  The deep dish with butter crust is excellent and feels a bit lighter than most deep dish pizzas.  Something about the tomatoes used stands out
column2: in particular.  The thin crust is decent (also
column3: it is much better when first ordered than when eaten as a leftover).  You really aren't going to go wrong having pizza here
column6: which serves essentially the exact same pizza.
